name: Debris (itch) (Donswelt)
description:
Debris

This one is just a small PICO-8 shoot'em-up (shmup) with a little twist or as I call it: a shmup short story.

  1. Try to survive 120 seconds.
  2. Shoot debris to raise bonus.
  3. Beat the hi-score.

That's all.

It's still a work in progress. I might add a few more features in the coming weeks. Once it's done, I will add the final PICO-8 cart for download.

Thanks for playing.
